turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bello Luna's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Hawaiian pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 1 hawaiin pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 hawaiin pizzas, and what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get them as gluten-free crust, too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll add that to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you are ordering 3 medium hawaiin gluten free crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would prefer to agree.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, excuse me, pick up pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
